body_html: I came across the same issue. All my images were PNGs so I ended up converting them to JPGs with this ImageMagick command: mogrify -format jpg *.png and then rm -f *.png in each directory containing images. After that, retraining the model worked just fine.
body_text: I came across the same issue. All my images were PNGs so I ended up converting them to JPGs with this ImageMagick command: mogrify -format jpg *.png and then rm -f *.png in each directory containing images. After that, retraining the model worked just fine.
body: I came across the same issue. All my images were PNGs so I ended up converting them to JPGs with this ImageMagick command: ```mogrify -format jpg *.png``` and then ```rm -f *.png``` in each directory containing images. After that, retraining the model worked just fine.
